title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 38.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 38.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to a health care plan that delivers or issues for delivery in this State a comprehensive health insurance policy or contract that uses a network of health care providers to deliver behavioral health services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
38.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 7/1/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
